description:
*Fixed non WebOS 2.0 compatibility

Welcome to ‘Deal A Meal,’ the personal chef application brought to you by JTR Softworks. 

Using our special meal randomizing technology, ‘Deal A Meal’ searches through hundreds of easy recipes to make a combination that is perfect for your specific needs.

Whether you’re on a special diet or trying to come up with fun meal ideas for yourself and your family, ‘Deal A Meal’ has got a meal just for you! Vegetarian and Vegan friendly! 

Feel free to add your own food items and recipes to increase the community database.

This is the light version, so if you like it check out the full version Deal A Meal 2.0, with many additional features & many more to come!
